title: september 16: how Mexico got its independence from Spain
description:
Hold up. You're telling us that Cinco de Mayo is not the day for the best deals on tacos and margaritas? Yep, you read that right; Cinco de Mayo is actually more important than filling our stomachs. In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, we learn about the true significance of May 5th, which actually all came down to Catholic priest Father Miguel Hidalgo. Along with this, Maia talks about how hip hop was integrated into mainstream music. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
